name: Angry Aye-Aye
description:
A single level platformer game of an Aye-Aye creature that uses a butt stomping somersault to land on top of enemies.

Defeat enemies, collect coins to increase your score and get to the other side of the level to complete the game.

Controls:  Left and Right Arrow Keys to move Left or Right, Space to Jump and Down Arrow Key to butt stomp somersault attack.

Created for Weekly Game Jam 220.  Theme:  Butt Stomp Button
